summary: The fascinating inside story of Lord Edward Montagu, one of England's most controversial and iconic aristocrats.
cast: Oliver Tobias|Lord Montagu of Beaulieu|Prince Michael of Kent|Jackie Stewart|Roy Strong|Nick Mason|Earl of March|Andrew Lancel|Simon Howard|Ralph Montagu|Murray Walker|Stirling Moss|Peregrine Cavendish|Alexander Thynne
title: Lord Montagu
